en-US.short_description: Video Alarm Clock for heavy sleepers. Wake up to music, puzzles & custom alarms.
en-US.full_description:
Tired of a boring alarm clock? Wake up with AlarmUp, the free video alarm clock for heavy sleepers. Our smart alarm uses custom video ringtones, music, and puzzles to make your morning better.

ğŸµ **Custom Alarm Sounds & Music Alarm**
- Wake up to your own videos, your favorite music, or a loud alarm sound.
- Discover thousands of new video clips from creators and influencers to use as your alarm.
- Use the AI Voice Generator to create a unique talking alarm with custom voices and emotions.

â° **Smart Alarm Clock for Heavy Sleepers**
- Set a loud alarm with missions and puzzles that make you wake up. No more oversleeping!
- Solve math problems, memory games, typing challenges, or even do squats to turn off the alarm clock.
- Customize your wake up with vibration, fade-in volume, and unlimited snooze options.
- Includes a simple, free timer and stopwatch for all your needs.

ğŸ¬ **Social & Video Alarm Features**
- Explore a feed of trending video alarms from the community.
- Like, save, and share your favorite video clips.
- Upload your own videos to share with others. Add hashtags and a caption to get discovered!
- Organize your saved videos into private or shared folders.

Download AlarmUp, the best free alarm clock app for Android, and make waking up fun again. Say good morning with a smart alarm that works for you!
